resources.string: Allow %1$s access to manage all files?

"Enabling Storage Scopes will make this app assume that it has all storage permissions that it asked for, despite not actually having any of them.
An app that doesn’t have any storage permissions is still allowed to create files and access files that it created, regardless of whether Storage Scopes is enabled."

"This app assumes that it has all storage permissions that it asked for, regardless of whether it actually has them.
An app that doesn’t have any storage permissions is still allowed to create files and access files that it created, regardless of whether Storage Scopes is enabled.
Optionally, you can grant this app access to additional files and folders (ie to those that weren’t created by the app itself)."
"Note that %1$s are effectively parts of one app. State of Storage Scopes is shared among them, same applies to permission grants, network usage stats etc."
All storage permissions are now denied
